article.title: Lockheed Martin Receives Contract for C4ISR Support Services
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin Services Incorporated has received an indefinite delivery/indefinite quantity, cost-plus-fixed-fee contract with a potential value of $59.3 million for life cycle support services in support of Space and Naval Warfare Systems Center San Diego Command, Control, Communications, Computers, Intelligence, Surveillance and Reconnaissance (C4ISR) Programs Office in Philadelphia. Specific efforts include logistics planning, worldwide system maintenance, installation and fielding of systems at user sites, site configuration management and other services.
